definition: The overall tone of the response must match the specified tone level.
The response must express the specified emotion type consistently throughout.
Determines the overall politeness of the response.
Defines the overall writing style.
Ensures each sentence maintains the same tone throughout. A mixed tone (e.g., [partly formal, partly informal] or [partly positive or partly negative]) within one response is considered a violation.
The response must primarily use the selected grammatical voice.

Requires inclusion/restriction of use of a specific figure type (simile, metaphor, personification, hyperbole, idiom) instances based on the relation. The figure type count must satisfy the given relation to num_occurrences.
The response must include or restrict the number of emotionally expressive adjectives (e.g., “beautiful”, “horrifying”, “delightful”). The count must satisfy the given relation to num_adjectives.
Ensures the inclusion/restriction of use of sensory expressions (sight, sound, touch, smell, taste). The sensory expression count must satisfy the given relation to num_details.
Controls the overall rhythm of the writing.
The response must adopt the specified pragmatic context.
The response must conform to the given speech-act type.
The response must use the selected syntactic pattern.
The response must enforce the selected grammatical mood.
Requires consistent use of a specified morphological form.
The text should include the given phonological element.
Defines the narrative viewpoint of the response.
Ensures the response situates itself in the correct temporal frame.

Requires the presence or limitation of onomatopoeic or sound-mimicking expressions (e.g., “buzz”, “clang”, “whisper”). Relation defines whether such expressions must appear at least, equal to, or less than a certain implied frequency.
The model must respond in character as the specified role_type, using appropriate expertise, tone, and language.
The response must align with the communicative goal of the given task_type.
Ensures the response’s vocabulary, tone, and examples are appropriate for the specified audience_type.
Requires adaptation of tone, structure, and phrasing to the specified scenario_type.
Ensures the emotional tone aligns with the scenario’s context.
Requires the response to be consistent with the described environment_type.
Requires alignment with the chosen culture_type and adaptation_level.
